text: Boomerang is the name of the 2nd television network owned by Cartoon Network. Boomerang was one of two spin-offs of Cartoon Network and Adult Swim showing classic animated cartoons and animated television series from the Hanna- Barbera archives. Cartoon Network showing Cartoon Network originals and modern cartoons, and Adult Swim showing adult cartoons for teens and adults. It was launched at the end of the 20th century and introduced to satellite on February 1, 2000. There were bumpers telling you what was coming up next. ==Programming== == Other websites == * Official website * BoomerangTV.co.uk - Official UK website * BoomerangTV.de - Official DE website == References == Category:Cartoon Network Category:American television networks Category:NBCUniversal Category:2000 establishments in the United States
title: Boomerang (TV network)
